title: Calendar
summary:
This article introduces a printable, single-page calendar for the year 2026. The main feature is its compact design, which displays all dates for the entire year on one sheet that automatically fits any paper size. For optimal printing, the creator recommends using landscape orientation and turning off headers and footers.

The text promotes the calendar as a practical and portable tool for planning, note-taking, and tracking time. It encourages a mindful approach to the year, ending with the advice to "be kind to others."

The calendar is provided in a formatted grid, listing months from January to December with their corresponding dates and weekday initials. It is created by Neatnik, and a link to the source is included.
chinese_summary:
本文介绍一款2026年可打印的单页日历，其主要特点是紧凑设计，将全年所有日期集中展示在一张纸上，并能自动适配任何纸张尺寸。为获得最佳打印效果，制作者建议采用横向页面设置并关闭页眉页脚。

文章将这款日历推广为实用便携的工具，适用于规划日程、记录备忘和时间追踪。它倡导以专注的心态迎接新的一年，并以“善待他人”的寄语收尾。

日历采用格式化网格呈现，按序列出一月至十二月各月份及其对应日期与星期缩写。该日历由Neatnik制作，文末附有来源链接。
